name: ZSPickerView
summary: ZSPickerView is simple and easy-to-use implementation for `UITextField` to use as `UIPickerView` and `UIDatePicker` written in swift.
description: ZSPickerView allows to transform `UITextField` as `UIPickerView` and `UIDatePicker` to pick data easily. It is designed to present a picker view to select data in `UITextField`.
